name: semiotic-standard-font
description: Semiotic Standard webfont based on Ron Cobb's iconography from the Alien franchise
author: John M. Knight

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:svg && npm run build:font && npm run build:duotone && npm run build:sprite && npm run build:css && npm run build:preview
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch svg -e svg --exec npm run build
